name: Procedure.partOf
title: Procedure.partOf
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: A larger event of which this particular procedure is a component or step.
element.comment: The MedicationAdministration resource has a partOf reference to Procedure, but this is not a circular reference.   For example, the anesthesia MedicationAdministration is part of the surgical Procedure (MedicationAdministration.partOf = Procedure).  For example, the procedure to insert the IV port for an IV medication administration is part of the medication administration (Procedure.partOf = MedicationAdministration).
